attributes.action: Objection to children as young as five being read Gay fairytales in school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children as young as 5 will be read gay fairytales  in school, one of these storys already being tested in certain schools is of a prince who shuns 3 princess's and runs away with a boy from the town, living happily ever after, we do not believe a child as young as 5 should be forced to hear these storys and it being out of parental consent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
